name: Retribution (NihonViolett)
description:
What do you do if you're a knight whose residence is haunted by a pair of demons and you need to find some ingredients to chase away the demons? You go to the dungeon in search of said ingredients, of course! Fear not, you're aided in your quest by your trustworthy pet who is nearly as skilled a fighter as you!

But who are the demons, and why are they invading your residence? You'll need to find out for yourself!

Features:

-No annoying random encounters, only bosses.

-Short, ideally can be beaten under ten minutes.

-The full story is only revealed after finishing the quest.

Credits:

-David Fesliyan for epilogue music.

-Aekashics for boss sprites.
